com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.scenes

Class CullGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.scenes.CullGrid

  • public class CullGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Grid that handles culling of immovable sprites. Each layer can have a cull grid. Cull grid's are grids of cells. TODO GRIDS
    Author:
    jlreyes
